title: Customer Jesse L√©ge Sr.
text:
I had many times in my life heard the phrase
"it was such a weight off of my shoulders"
As soon as I set out to apply for my Silocial Security,it turned into a nightmare. I have schooling,but not much of an education, so I struggle with that kind of stuff , but I can build a house & have Captained vessels huge enuf to carry a house across the Gulf of Mexico.
So , Medicare was almost automatic, but when it came time to tackle supplemental ins....I freaked. Did NOT want to do this, so to make a long story short...somehow, Jane Bannerman's name struck a familiar note with me. I thought she was the one who contacted me months ago for exactly this very thing.... Well...I call her...she told me what I needed, gave me choices & walked me through it all at a most comfortable pace, clear as a bell from "Hello
My name is Jane B....,all the way to...."you're all set. You know how to reach me if you have any questions.
I think I went to bed that night....smiling & woke with it the next day. I am such a happy camper & you. Ant imagine how secure I now feel as I start my returement years.
No worries,none. Because I have the number to MediGap Austin,Texas.
It's been almost a week, I'm still smiling.ü§óüëçüèº
